name: Smart Payment Association
membership:
www.emvco.com, www.ifsf.org, www.pcisecuritystandards.org, www.e-csg.eu, www.eurosmart.com
Card Fraud Prevention Forum
memberOrga: Giesecke & Devrient, Gemalto, Oberthur Technologies, Safran Identity and Security, ST Microelectronics, Austria Card
goal:
The Smart Payment Association (SPA) addresses the challenges of the evolving payment ecosystem, offering leadership and expert guidance to help its members and their customers realize the opportunities of smart, secure and personalized payment systems & services both now and for the future.

The SPA is a founding Member of the ECSG (European Card Stakeholders Group) and Spokesperson of the Vendor Sector.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: PSD2, AML 4, EVA Regulatory Technical Standard on Strong Customer Authentication
